attributes.action: Ban the use of al types of plastic on fruit and vegetables in supermarkets
attributes.additional_details: If we can get this too 100,000 signatures we could stop all supermarkets and local stores from using plastic to wrap its fruit and vegetables, by signing this petition you are doing your bit in helping #CutOutPlastic4Good
attributes.background: In 11 years our air will not be breathable because of the CO2 emissions in the air and plastic in the ocean, a big part of that is single use plastic. Walking into any local supermarket there is so much plastic that is NOT needed in the packaging at all. Like fruit for instance.
